subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: After a chaotic and disgraceful Gold Cup match, a statement of disgust from the Panama team illustrated Concacaf’s lack of public confidence.
snippet: After a chaotic and disgraceful Gold Cup match, a statement of disgust from the Panama team illustrated Concacaf’s lack of public confidence.
